account.title: My Profile

noToken.title: Not Signed In

normalUser.title: Account:
normalUser.description: Upgrade your account now and get started with exclusive features and more.
normalUser.descriptionAPPX: Advanced features are not available in the Microsoft Store version.

account.pointsDescription: AI Translation Points will be consumed based on the amount of audio successfully processed by the service of translation and speech recognition. (1 Point / Min)

premium.title: SPlayer Premium
premium.description: Go Premium now to help SPlayer change the way people watch videos, and get access to more advanced features.
premium.description1:
We’ve made some updates to the Premium services, please download the latest version of SPlayer.

The AI Translation Points Pack will be available in the new release. The Points is consumed based on the amount of audio successfully processed by the service of translation and speech recognition. Current Premium members will get extra ( Remaining Days of Premium Service * 60 ) AI Translation Points.

explanation.title: About the Pricing
explanation.description1: Applying a complex Translation System, which supports the translation of multiple languages and the speech recognition of long duration videos, has been incurring massive ongoing maintenance costs so far.
explanation.description2: We are thrilled to your strong support, of which the impact and power will help us make the SPlayer better, and your adoption of the new technology will finally contribute to bridging the language gaps and connecting the world.
explanation.description6: Only the monthly payment plan is available during the open beta test.

content.description1: Get 180 free AI Translation Points per month (Orig. $6.8)
content.description2: Buy AI Translation Points pack at a discount (Start at $0.025 / min)
content.description3: Smart Translation and Speech Recognition supports more languages
content.description4: Edit and export subtitles or translation results
content.description5: Download online videos with no usage limits
content.description6: Fetch online subtitles in the mobile version (In development)
content.description7: More advanced features are coming soon ...

translationEdit.quickEditDescription: Allow quick editing of the selected subtitle when the video is paused.

points.title: AI Translation Points
points.description: AI Translation Points will be consumed based on the amount of audio successfully processed by the service of translation and speech recognition. (1 Point / Min) Your Points will no longer expire.
points.guestWarning: Points purchased as guest will be LOST if you sign-out or reset settings. Press Cancel to sign-in or press OK to continue purchasing as guest.
points.service:
Need Speech-to-Text and AI Translation in batch?
Please try our Translation Service

masVersion.content: Smart Translation function needs your consent for uploading anonymous media info to the server  side, and you will not receive translation results if you disagree. There is no privacy information will be collected.

tryToDisable.partOne: SPlayer uses anonymous data to enhance user experience. Smart Translation will be disabled if you

select.content: Select the language you hear in the video and click the generate button.
select.contentLimit: Select the language you hear in the video and click the generate button. You can generate one AI Translation for free per day.

translate.title: About {time} Left
translate.content: Please do not skip the video or close the application. You can check the progress on the translation panel.
translate.contentTranslate: Subtitle in source language found, translation in process ...
translate.contentGrabbing: Subtitle in source language not found, extracting audio ...
translate.contentSpeech: Audio uploaded, speech recognition and translation in process ...

success.title: Translation Done
success.content: AI Translation is ready, please check it on the translation panel.

discard.title: AI Translation is in Progress
discard.content: Are you sure you want to quit? If you quit, the translation progress will not be restored.

noLineFail.title: Network Error
noLineFail.content: Please check your network connection and try again.

timeOutFail.content: The connection to the server failed. Please try later.

serverErrorFail.title: Translation Failed
serverErrorFail.content: Translation failed because of a server error. Please try later.

ExistsFail.title: Translation Failed
ExistsFail.content: Your previous translation task is being processed on the server, please try again later.

ExhaustedFail.title: Maximum Limit Reached
ExhaustedFail.content: It seems like you have translated a lot of videos today! Need extra time? Contact us via support@splayer.org.
